title: Observability, reliability, and launch gate baseline
scope: Frontend analytics integration to real tenant telemetry

validation.backend_m7_live_tests: docker compose exec backend sh -lc 'cd /app && pytest -q tests/test_m7_observability_live.py'
validation.backend_full_live_suite: docker compose exec backend sh -lc 'cd /app && pytest -q tests'
validation.frontend_build: docker compose exec frontend sh -lc 'cd /app && npm run build'
